name: The Trapdoor Ep 2 Heading Home
description:
A Fanmade VR Platformer

The Trapdoor_Ep 2 Heading Home

My twins asked me to make a game of a show we all love so I made these 2 games 

Ep 1 Lost and found =PC game Point and click

Ep 2 Heading Home =VR MetaQuest 2 Platformer

Both free to play

Say hello to Berk and friends and get back to the castle, 

After Berk and Boni have been to the market they have taken a wrong turn on return and must find there way back to the castle before The great Grumpy pants gets hungry 

Only 3 levels as just a side project and a bit of fun but full save and load,unlock levels in place.

Game Based on the show by CMTB Animation and Queensgate Productions Ltd 

The show was created by British animators Terry Brain and Charlie Mills.
